TypeError: Exception encountered when calling layer 'nlpusf_model' (type NLPUSFModel).

CustomLSTMCell.get_initial_state() takes 1 positional argument but 2 were given
Alignment: The LSTM layer in the NLPUSFModel layer is not configured to return the initial state of the LSTM layer. This is because the LSTM layer is not a stateful layer. To fix this, you can either make the LSTM layer stateful, or you can remove the call to get_initial_state() from the NLPUSFModel layer.
